name: Trekking hidden valley
description:
Trekking
is the best way to explore natural beauty, incredible geology and diverse
biodiversity of Thinh Linh valley and Vem cave. This trip is designed to make the good sense of
combination of physical activities and relaxing time while experiencing off route
trekking in Thinh Linh valley and boat ridding in Vem cave. Summary: 3 hours trekking
cross jungle, bamboo raft ridding to visit valley and cruising out to remote
area of Lan Ha bay.
